I'll explain briefly: Since if you reject this round, you’ll be proposing in round 3 but then your dollars lose an extra 20% (and yours lose 10% per round), Alice’s continuation value is about 81 effective dollars (0.9²×100), so to induce immediate acceptance in round 2 her nominal share must be at least 90 (because 0.9×90 = 81).
